props.name: id
props.description: `id` for the select that is mapped to the label `for` attribute. If one is not provided, it will be generated.

props.name: hideLabel
props.description: Removes the label element but sets the select `aria-label` to `label` text for a11y.

props.name: prompt
props.description: Adds an option that is disabled and selected by default to serve as a `placeholder` for the select.

props.name: options
props.description: Build options programatically with data. Array of objects [{ text: String, value: String}] to give greater control. Array of strings ['String'] for simpler setup (value and text will be the same).
